events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle and another on the highway around 7 AM. Initial details provided.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to clear reference to vehicle collision reported by the claimant.
Claims agent Ms. Rogers assigned to the case to initiate further communication and guide the claimant through the process.
Acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps in processing their vehicle accident case.
Requested police report, pictures of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to verify and process the auto accident claim.
All requested documents including the official police report and photographs of vehicle damage have been submitted by the claimant.
Investigation team initiated review of submitted materials to determine liability and extent of damages in the reported accident.
Investigation concluded, confirming the accident details and liability as reported by the claimant with no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the claimant based on repair costs and policy coverage agreed upon after investigation.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling of their auto accident claim.
Claim officially approved, authorizing payment issuance to cover vehicle repairs as outlined in the settlement agreement.
Payment issued to the claimant's preferred account to cover the approved settlement amount for collision damages.
Claim closed successfully after payment release and confirmation from customer that repairs are underway as planned.
